mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.sche_no, p.sche_title, TO_CHAR(p.sche_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sche_start_str, TO_CHAR(p.sche_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sche_end_str, p.is_important, p.type FROM p_schedule p LEFT JOIN p_schedule_member m ON p.sche_no = m.sche_no WHERE (p.user_no=#{user_no} OR m.user_no=#{user_no}) AND TRUNC(p.sche_end) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY p.sche_no, p.sche_title, p.sche_start, p.sche_end, p.is_important, p.type ORDER BY p.sche_end ASC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
